broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain.proposal

Interface MarkovProposalFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkovNormalProposal

    public interface MarkovProposalFunction
    A Markov proposal distribution generates a new step in a Markov Chain (i.e. is based only on information from the current step and contains no memory of the walk beyond that).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MonteCarloStep generate(MonteCarloStep step)
      Generate a new step in the Markov Chain based only on the supplied step.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        MonteCarloStep generate(MonteCarloStep step)
        Generate a new step in the Markov Chain based only on the supplied step.
        Parameters:
        step - the current step in the Markov Chain
        Returns:
        the proposed new step.
